hasAlternativeVersions._instruction: Add all (meta)data model versions that can be used alternatively to this (meta)data model version.

hasSupplementVersions._instruction: Add all (meta)data model versions that supplement this (meta)data model version.

isNewVersionOf._instruction: Add the dataset version preceding this (meta)data model version.

serializationFormats._instruction: Add all content types in which (meta)data compliant with this (meta)data model version can be stored in.

specificationFormats._instruction: Add all content types in which the schemas of this (meta)data model version are stored in.

type._instruction: Add the type of this (meta)data model version.
